author: eptwts
text:
you can be productive without doing any work if you put the right systems in place...

even when i don't do any manual work all day, things are still getting done

the "workaholic" trap is thinking you have to do everything manually, this is stupid

"16 hour days" should be for testing, validating & putting systems in place - not for the same exact work over & over everyday

if something can be effectively outsourced/automated, then it should
